org.spf4j.base

Class Throwables

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.spf4j.base.Throwables

  • @ParametersAreNonnullByDefault
public final class Throwables
extends Object
    utility class for throwables.
    Author:
    zoly

    • Method Detail

      • isRetryable

        @CheckReturnValue
public static boolean isRetryable(Throwable value)
        figure out if a Exception is retry-able or not. If while executing a operation a exception is returned, that exception is retryable if retrying the operation can potentially succeed.
        Parameters:
        value -
        Returns:
        true/false is retry-able or not, null when this is not clear and can be context dependent.

      • suppress

        @CheckReturnValue
 @Deprecated
public static <T extends Throwable> T suppress(@Nonnull
                                                                              T t,
                                                                              @Nonnull
                                                                              Throwable suppressed)
        Deprecated. use suppressLimited instead.
        Functionality will call Throwable.addSuppressed, 2 extra things happen: 1) limit to nr of exceptions suppressed. 2) if exception is already suppressed, will not add it. 3) will return a clone of exception t.
        Type Parameters:
        T -
        Parameters:
        t -
        suppressed -

      • suppressLimited

        public static void suppressLimited(@Nonnull
                                   Throwable t,
                                   @Nonnull
                                   Throwable suppressed)
        Functionality will call Throwable.addSuppressed, 2 extra things happen: 1) limit to nr of exceptions suppressed. 2) if exception is already suppressed, will not add it.
        Parameters:
        t -
        suppressed -

                                                                 int maxSuppressed)

      • getSuppressed

        public static Throwable[] getSuppressed(Throwable t)
        Utility to get suppressed exceptions. In java 1.7 it will return t.getSuppressed() + in case it is Iterable any other linked exceptions (see SQLException) java 1.6 behavior is deprecated.
        Parameters:
        t -
        Returns:

      • contains

        public static boolean contains(@Nonnull
                               Throwable t,
                               Predicate<Throwable> predicate)
        checks in the throwable + children (both causal and suppressed) contain a throwable that respects the Predicate.
        Parameters:
        t - the throwable
        predicate - the predicate
        Returns:
        true if a Throwable matching the predicate is found.

      • contains

        public static boolean contains(@Nonnull
                               Throwable t,
                               @Nonnull
                               Throwable toLookFor)
        checks in the throwable + children (both causal and suppressed) contain a throwable that respects the Predicate.
        Parameters:
        t - the throwable
        predicate - the predicate
        Returns:
        true if a Throwable matching the predicate is found.

      • first

        @Nullable
 @CheckReturnValue
public static <T extends Throwable> T first(@Nonnull
                                                                         Throwable t,
                                                                         Class<T> clasz)
        return first Exception in the causal chain Assignable to clasz.
        Type Parameters:
        T -
        Parameters:
        t -
        clasz -
        Returns:

      • first

        @Nullable
 @CheckReturnValue
public static Throwable first(@Nonnull
                                                           Throwable t,
                                                           Predicate<Throwable> predicate)
        Returns the first Throwable that matches the predicate in the causal and suppressed chain, the suppressed chain includes the supression mechanism included in SQLException.
        Parameters:
        t - the Throwable
        predicate - the Predicate
        Returns:
        the Throwable the first matches the predicate or null is none matches.

      • firstCause

        @Nullable
 @CheckReturnValue
public static Throwable firstCause(@Nonnull
                                                                Throwable throwable,
                                                                Predicate<Throwable> predicate)
        Returns first Throwable in the causality chain that is matching the provided predicate.
        Parameters:
        throwable - the Throwable to go through.
        predicate - the predicate to apply
        Returns:
        the first Throwable from the chain that the predicate matches.
